But at least with this sacrifice made you will never see that cursed ring again... unless of course it would turn out there was more than one in your world, which is not very likely.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.heaven_scroll: As any other demigod or human once did, ever since the begginning of your journey you dreamed to transcend the limits of your vulnerable body. That dream, among all other attributes, included freely roaming the skies of this world, alike a god above all other.<br2/>Well, this scroll might not allow you to roam all the
skies. But with the immense might of the Nether Star powering it, it can do a thing or two.<br2/>Should you find yourself in the presence of an active Beacon, penetrating skies with

its vivid lightbeam - and Presente do paraíso will grant you highly controllable and convenient ability to float and fly around, as long as you don't wonder to far away from beacon's arcane aura.<br2/>That aura, unfortunately, isn't strong enough on its own to continiously drain much required energy for powering your flight from it. The scroll will slowly, yet steadily consume experience you absorbed, to be able to keep
you in the air.<br2/>You are pretty sure there must be a way to improve its power and overcome the limitations it has, but for a while longer that's what you are left to work with.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.fabulous_scro: Your expectations were, eventually, confirmed. Now that the gate to The End is open and its boundless reaches have fell before your superior might, you were finally able to design an improved version of Presente do paraíso.<br2/>One that may not eliminate limits of its precursor entirely, but at least expands them significantly.

This scroll does allow you to freely fly across the skies of all worlds and dimension, without need to stay close the Beacon. Powering your flight with experience alone is quite expensive though, so don't expect your ascension to last

nearly as long as it would within the beacon's range.<br2/>On the other hand, Graça do criador is capable of draining beacon's power much more efficiently, and should you choose to stay within that range, you will not have to sacrifice any experience at all to remain above all others.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.escape_scroll:
Though death has proven to be only a temporary inconvenience for a demigod like you, sometimes this inconveniece takes great toll.
Much greater than you would like to pay - depending on where you die, your precious gear, forged from finest materials and collected from all corners of the Overworld, can be lost to Oblivion or incredibly difficult to recover.

This scroll is an ensurance against such happening.<br2/>It cannot protect its bearer from death, but should their life be taken, whatever they would drop in place of their death will instead be taken

back to the respawn point, across any distances and dimensions. The scroll itself will remain where its bearer was killed, but unlike items you would normally drop, it will not burn, or fall into the Void where you might've met your demise, or vanish into nothingness if you leave it unattended for too long.<br2/>Only the hand of demigod, though not neccessarily yours alone, can ever claim it back.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.ender_ring.pa: Ender Chest has proven to be extremely useful thing, allowing you to access items of your choice across any distances and dimensions. Unlike items you may carry on yourself, those in your ender chest are not endangered when your physical shell gets destroyed.<br2/>There is a slight inconvenience to it, however -

the need to carry around that massive chest, chucking it down whenever you want to pull something out of its extradimensional depths, and then removing it with incredibly delicate tool, unless you want it to be

shattered into obsidian pieces you once so carefully fused together.<br2/>Anel do fim is designed exactly to solve this issue, allowing you to tear the fabric of space and access contents of your ender chest with nothing but sheer force of will.<br2/>Just don't forget to pull your hand out of when you release the rift.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.arcane_scroll: Creation of arcane scrolls, besides writing materials and mundane pergaminho em branco, will usually take a couple arcane ingredients, to make sure that the scroll you create does something more than just exist. They can be carried around like any other accessories.<br2/>These are unlikely contribute as much to your image of terrifying, mighty mage,

especially given that books were invented a long time ago by now. Yet that matters not given how vast are practical possibilities they may provide, if designed and put together masterfully.<br2/>Weirdly, it's difficult to come by a scroll used for just storing writings, even among the most ancient samples of literature.<br2/>Perhaps, it's not such an obvious design after all?..
Here is outlined the way to craft an empty scroll.<br2/>Might not be extremely useful on its own, but it serves as a base for creation of arcane scrolls.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.darkest_scrol: Found withing the treasures of dangerous Bastions, those rolls of black-stained pergament draw little suspicion at first glance. Yet in truth they are infused with some unknown sort of dark magic, one that seems strangely familiar to one that empowers Anel das Sete Maldições.<br2/>That magic however lays dormant within its vessel,
a raw, slumbering energy seemingly waiting to be awoken and exploited. Perhaps the O Pergaminho Mais Escuro could serve as base for creation of new, more powerful arcane scrolls?
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.avarice_scrol:
One another relic harnessing the boundless strength of the Seven Curses, this elegant scroll is designed to fulfill the boundless inner greed you so carefully conceal within your soul.
Its primary effect is an ability to confuse minds of the creatures you trade or barter with, into misguessing true price and benefit of the deal... much in your favor.

Piglins seem to be most affected by this ability, with their helpless affection by gold. Not only this allows the scroll to overcome the effect of the Second Curse and render them neutral in your regard, as they normally are

towards anyone who bears enough golden equipment on them, but it also makes bartering with those creatures about twice as beneficial on average, allowing you to get anywhere from normal item quantity to three times the quantity in exchange from any single barter.<br2/>Villagers are also affected by this scroll's ability, even though not as much as Piglins are - stable 35<percent/> discount on every trade is about as much

as you can get from their little avid person.<br2/>Apart from this, you also get a slight chance of having an entire Emerald materialize into existance right from within your avaricious dreams whenever you happen to slay any living creature, and <&l>+1 Fortune Level<clear/> which will doubtlessly help you get your hands on some more riches anytime you feel like descending into the mines.
Just don't let that greed of yours take over your mind, and you'll be fine.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.infinimeal.pa: One another way to harness the power that rests within Coração da Terra, this arcane substance embodies the power of nature itself, with its everlasting desire to spread its roots across the earth, to grow and thrive no matter what.<br2/>Letting it come in contact with most forms of plantlife is enough to significantly

accellerate their growth, similar to the effect produced when using Bone Meal. Unlike Bone Meal, however, you only need a mere grains of it to achieve such effect. Left alone, it seems to be able to draw power from surrounding

nature, growing and replenishing itself in quantity after being used - though never to more than there was created originally.<br2/>It also works on certain plants that normal fertilizers have no effect on, specifically Sugar Cane, Cactuses, Vines and Nether Wart.
With a fine selection of arcane ingredients, those which contain the power of other dimensions, you can alter the earthly nature of Heart of the Sea, transforming it into something different... Vastly more powerful.<br2/>The power of cosmos itself now rests at the palm of your hand. Only time will tell what unimaginable feats can be
achieved with it, what fabulous artifacts can be powered with its reality-bending energies.<br2/>But one thing is for certain - the world will tremble beneath the steps of their bearer.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.abyssal_heart: When this unearthly abomination fell into your hands for the first time, description-defying mix of feelings have overcome your mind, among which there was a place for terror and excitement, admiration and disgust. The gaze of its lonely eye befell you with intent impossible to comprehend, but once initial wave of emotions retreated - you have

concluded that it poses no threat to you.<br2/>Still, you know not what it truly is, and where it came from. Perhaps your insufferable existence, and efforts to live in spite of Seven Curses were noticed by some unnameable eldritch power, and through your

damnable being it have chosen to channel itself into the world. Perhaps it is a mere accident, a fluke in reality itself that allowed something like this to appear. Perhaps it is your ailing mind that have conceived this horror in some nightmarish fever, and with its growth - corruption of the curses have managed to manifest it into the mortal realm?<br2/>Perhaps it's best to never know, for some truths are much

more unsettling than anything a man's imagination can come up with.<br2/>Regardless, now you are the rightful owner of this thing. And it will not be long before you can put it to some unimaginably violent, frightening use... The world will suffer tenfold for all the suffering it caused to you.
Though many have sought this relic, it appears that you are among the few who found. In fact, it was not even that hard at all. Though a journey itself was nothing short of a feat, once you have made your way to the End City and opened the first treasure chest - there it was, awaiting you.<br2/>It certainly has connection to Seven Curses, but you cannot

begin to imagine how circumstances aligned in such a way that it was in that exact chest you have opened, and no other. Determinism was never among your favored beliefs, and yet... perhaps it was destiny?<br2/>At any rate, the taste is divine, and the ability it has
to empower you to bear another ring is undeniably useful.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.eternal_bindi: The similarity of this curse's name to Curse of Binding is no accident - for it does exactly the same thing as the latter, preventing you from removing armor and accessories from yourself once equipped. A Distorção, however, is in the fact that items bearing this one will persist with you even across death. This might be less severe in the case of armor, since sooner or later

it will break; for most accessories, however, with this curse applied you condemn yourself to bear them until you die permanently or until the end of time, whichever comes first.<br2/>Unlike most other curses, the only way to obtain this one seems to be by using classical
Enchanting Table, empowered by the Pérola do encantador.
Applicable only to armor, this curse adds an aftermath to the damage you would take from your enemies. Severe debuffs will befall you for every hit that you take, the greater the damage - the greater the debuffs.<br2/>Hopefully, the chance of such happening is only about one in ten for every piece of armor with this curse that you bear.

As per usual, you can occasionally find items bearing this curse among ancient treasures which you periodically pillage. It might be useful to power Pergaminho das Mil Maldições if you have such, but whether or not the tradeoff is worth it is for you to judge.
Enchanting Table, empowered by the Pérola do encantador.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.the_infinitum: It is conceived. In union with this dark, flesh-covered book, with horror that its pages conceal, you will wreak havoc upon those who threatened you.<br2/>Upon those who laughed at you, those who underestimated you, those who undertaken every effort to break you, to cleanse the world of your presence, be they disgusted by corruption that you bear or simply

viewing you as an easy prey. For you are the writings that cannot be burned, knowledge that cannot be forgotten, truth that cannot be denied.<br2/>You will reveal to this realm what it have so persistently
attempted to unmake and erase, you will engrave upon the tablets of eternity that reality which it have tried to hide.<br2/>You will teach them all a lesson they shall never forget.
One of the toughest lessons you have learned ever since first equipping Anel das Sete Maldições is that Endermen are no longer able to tolerate your existence. They have haunted you ever since - screeching, frightening horrors, chasing you in the night under the stars, and in smothering darkness of twisted salt-soaked caverns beneath the ground, possessed by

unbendable desire to decimate your being. Before long, you have accepted that to restore neutral relations with them is by all means an impossible undertaking, and abandoned any and every attempt to achieve such.

If that was the end of it - perhaps, to submit yourself to such fate and perpetually suffer their nightmarish onslaught would become nothing more than another part of your routine, and you would bear it with acceptance you have achieved in bearing all other curses.<br2/>If only... Now that The End beckons you to meet its challenges, traverse its lands and claim its treasures, the Endermen have become an

obstacle in your way equal to which you did not face yet. For that dimension is inhabited fully by their kind, and thus, to even survive entering it seems a feat beyond the limits of your power as a demigod.<br2/>Perhaps, it is time to recede, to finally abandon your hope of surmounting this world's challanges and harnessing corruption of the curses. But the battle may yet be won. With this sword, and your sheer strength of will you may yet
stand victorious. For if peace cannot be made... it can only mean war.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.the_cube.name: Non-Euclidean Cube
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.the_cube.page: Many of those who laid their claim on six mighty spellstones have pondered the possibility to, perhaps, somehow combine their powers into an artifact of might never before witnessed. Many have tried, and many have failed... Until now.<br2/>At last, you discovered a way to achieve such a feat. With power of the cosmos manifest in your hands, you may force

elements into such form that defies reality itself. The pinnacle of your exploration and research, it will become a symbol of your superiority over any mortal creature that ever walked the lands of three great worlds.
With its innumerable powers, even death you shall now transcend... For insofar as this cube will last forever, you are in the presence of immortality.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.desolation_ri: You can scarce comprehend presence imposed upon reality by Coração do Abismo, but, as you have recently discovered, comprehension is not neccessary for the ability to make use of it. Among few equally wonderful and terrible things that can draw power from it, there is this ring - even more nightmarish, perhaps, than Anel das Sete Maldições, in its
unnameable nature.<br2/>It offers to conveniently fulfill your gnawing desire to set yourself free of neccessity to endlessly slaughter creatures that could once tolerate your presence,

but have lost such ability soon as you submitted yourself to the burden of Seven Curses... By erasing them from the very existence surrounding you.<br2/>The cost of such reality-bending power is perilous, however, as should you decide that you desire it - you will be bound to it forevermore. And as you know by now, void can be more unbearable than even most frightening, ever-present threat...
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.astral_potato: In the everlasting battle of carrot lovers against potato enjoyers, the latter were bound to find themselves at a steady disadvantage. After all, what is a baked potato, in spite of all its deliciousness, in the face of immense nutritional value and reinvigorating effects of a mere carrot, albeit covered in some gold?

Today, we say "no more". The latest culinary invention of the cosmos itself shall fulfill two purposes - satiating our hunger, and becoming a symbol of our supremacy in the war on carrot. The appropriate name we have given to this

great delicacy will no doubt further mock and demoralize our enemy. What a shame would it be for them to find out they were utterly defeated by "Teleportato"? What horror will such awareness paint upon their faces?<br2/>It won't be long before we find out...
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.cosmic_cake.p: There is only one issue in the mundane cake, one final flaw that prevents it from becoming perfect - it always ends, as imminently as life of a mortal man. At last, you conceived a way to rectify this annoying imperfection, letting you enjoy its creamy grace forevermore.<br2/>Imbued with primordial power, incorporating alien delicacy and spiced up with elemental

energies, this cake defies the flow of time, reversing entropy itself to restore its glorious, palatable form. However much you submit yourself to the sin of gluttony, it will always recover from any devouring assault of yours.

Who can withstand in the face of such deliciousness, who can resist the desire to exchange power, influence, riches and even life itself for becoming submerged in ceaseless, infinite act of consumption? Those things are temporary after all... but the cake, the cake is eternal.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.eldritch_amul: Though Amuleto da Ascenção is perfected and pure in its form, it may yet be empowered further. At the cost of sacrificing the purity, sure, but why would a cursed being such as you fret over this loss anyway?<br2/>The jumble of flesh known as Coração do Abismo will happily latch onto your amulet, corrupting it into such a

twisted form that defies description. Once vivid, elegant stone at its core is replaced with a glossy, onyx-like eye, gazing upon you and the world alike with uneasy implication and unknowable intent. Even madman would deny

this abomination the touch to himself, but you welcome it upon your neck. For whereas madman is a victim of his own delusional perception of the world, you see it now for what it is...<br2/>And it is much more terrible than all the eyes of infinite abyss.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.ascension_amu: By now, you are aware that amuleto curioso in your possession is not unique, and in fact such a thing is granted to many other demigods beyond your time and space. There seems to exist a few variations of it, with different colors and different powers. What exactly determined the color in your current possession is unknown, but they all seem to mean
something and be connected in some way.<br2/>With power contained within Coração do Cosmos you can transform your amulet into the form of unwitnessed might and ambition. Proudly named Amulet
of Ascension, it will grant you abilities of all possible colors...<br2/>Fate may have decided the beginning of your existence in this realm, but the end of it is yours to shape.
With enough deaths, terrible novelty of losing parts of your soul with each one have withered away, leaving only the troublesome experience of locating places of your demise in an effort to recollect them. Those places often fall to be in the most unnavigable parts of the world, as if to incur frustration of such extent that it be named another curse of ring bearer.

As many other curses, however, this one too can be overcome. With this thing in your pocket, you will never again have to rely on your failing memory alone to aid you in search of your Cristal da alma. It will conveniently point you to the

nearest one, wherever it is, so long as you are in the right dimension.<br2/>Notably, there is one place where it fails to work, and its needle spins uncontrollably at alarming speeds - Soul Sand Valley. How many forgotten souls must wander that damned place to produce such a strong interference? Perhaps, it is a mystery better left unsolved.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.curse_transpo: Bearing the Seven Curses, you have aquired ability to draw power from curses bound to some of the ancient gear you find in your explorations, and even create such yourself with the help of Pérola do encantador. But they still are a great nuisance at times, as even though you can transpose them from one item from another, so far you had no way of separating them from
enchantments when doing so.<br2/>With this little invention, however, your curse management abilities should improve significantly. It offers a way to separate curses and only curses from any item of
your equipment; not a cheap one at that, but a way nonetheless.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.enigmatic_ely: Combined with some fireworks, Elytra provides an outstanding means of transportation, easily outpacing any horse, boat or minecart alike. There are only two major concerns surrounding its prolonged use - swift weardown, and necessity to maintain steady supply of fireworks.<br2/>Elytra Majestosa resolves both of them. It offers remarkable

durability, and can use enderic energies to propel the wearer forward during the flight at their wish, in a manner not dissimilar to fireworks. Doing so puts greater strain on hardness of the elytra, but insofar it can

be repaired with etherium in conventional anvil - that should not be too much of a concern.<br2/>Apart from that, it is covered with much more vibrant color patterns, leaving nobody in doubt regarding its magnificent, extraordinary qualities.
Where exactly this so called "blood of gods" comes from is a question yet unanswered, and perhaps better left as such. Now that you have some at your disposal, however, you can consume it to increase your body's ability to channel arcane energies, allowing you to equip one more of those precious charms that magnify your abilities in one way or another.

The relic of such rarity is almost impossible to find, and you cannot help but wonder how it happened that one ended up in your hands. Perhaps, you were drawn together by your divine nature, or perhaps some greater power directed you towards it?..
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.enigmatic_eye: An unexpected find among piles of treasure and junk, this eye have immediately consumed your attention with its distinguishably unearthly form. You could not resist the temptation of curiosity, and have chosen to awake it from slumber that lasted many centuries at least, and perhaps even many millenia.<br2/>Creator of the eye have soon

made himself known to you, and now that he is aware of your presence in this world - the eye itself is no longer necessary for him to observe and speak to you. He follows your footsteps since, remarking on things now and then. So far communication between you remains entirely unilateral, and thus it is hard

to establish what he is, and what motive he has to scrupulously contemplate your every move.<br2/>What can be said for sure is that he is no stranger to the world you currently inhabit, nor to higher beings such as you. Most certainly he once walked these lands himself, but extent of his participation in their past history remains a mystery yet. Much as where he is now, why he have chosen to speak to you, and what
expectations he places upon your journey.<br2/>For now, you can only hope that in time he will supply you with desired answers.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.insignia.name: Insígnia encantadora
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.insignia.page: Although this little trinket will not afford you increased strength, speed or will - there is more to it than appears at first glance. It allows you to conceal your name in the eyes of other demigods, and replace it with the one of your liking. Conveniently, it does not reduce the amount of other charms you can bear beside it.<br2/>The obvious way to make use

of it would be deception, but potential here is unfortunately limited, as insignia will only affect the name others see when they observe you in person. Besides, those who possess or are connected with certain godlike powers may

still be able to recognize your true name.<br2/>Another way is to distinguish yourself. This is where opportunities are limitless, especially considering that fancy colors and styles O tinteiro do arquiteto is known to be capable of producing are fully applicable to the alternative name you can engrave upon your insignia.
book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.end_anchor.pa: However barren and desolate lands of The End are, there exist reasons why one could want to dwell there. Mostly two - to seek something, or to hide from something. Until recently there was a minor inconvenience getting in the way of such desires, but with invention of Âncora dimensional the challenge of binding the point of your resurrection to somewhere
within those lands is finally overcome.<br2/>Âncora dimensional works in the manner not dissimilar to that of Respawn Anchor, but will require Ender Pearls to be recharged instead of much

cheaper Glowstone. As a repayment for increased maintenance costs - it can function where Respawn Anchor cannot, and has a noticeable chance to not spend a charge upon your revival. Things such as Poção do Recall will work with it much as they do with its predecessor, and Dispenser can still be used to automate recharging.<br2/>Only one thing remains of concern. Even for higher beings, space between worlds

is not the safest of places to traverse, most so when stripped of flesh... You cannot help but wonder what terrible places await those who are mislead by the light of their beacons, and what grisly fate befalls them in there.
book.enigmaticlegacy.landing_text: In front of you lies the well of great knowledge, a place where some of this world's greatest mysteries belong, scrupulously researched and carefully catalogized.<br2/>As your journey continues and the world reveals itself to you, you may revisit and behold knowledge you gathered within these pages.

book.enigmaticlegacy.entry.cosmic_scroll: The might of this rumor-shadowed scroll is denied to most demigods, even those who have approached the godship rather close. Who is permitted to possess it is at the discretion of The Architect himself, and as rumors would have it - the journey to $(l:https://discord.gg/fuWK8ns)his domain$(/l) is long and full of dangers, and to be noticed by that godly being is an honor few of its dwellers ever had.
Those who did, however, are awarded with power which has no equal; for the world to bask in their glory, and for them to spread the faith to the ears and eyes of others.
